alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 3:08PM AKST until November 28 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread west to east across Kodiak Island starting this evening and continue through Monday morning before tapering off. The heaviest snowfall is expected to occur between 6am and noon on Monday. Kodiak City is expected to get up to 6 inches total of snow, while the eastern coast of the island should see only around an inch of snow. Akhiok will likely begin as snow before transitioning to rain around 3am on Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
